evidence.claim: Pria.Care utilizes AWS for cloud services and API management.
Health data is exchanged using FHIR standards.
Pria.Care supports HL7 messaging for interoperability with electronic health records.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated through REST APIs.
They leverage X12 transaction sets for billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions or specific clearinghouse operations.
